abstract: Federal officials announce Fish and Wildlife Service will clean and restore Malheur National Wildlife Refuge in Burns, Ore, at cost of some $4 million; area was site of armed takeover by ranchers protesting federal land use policies.
lead_paragraph: The United States Fish and Wildlife Service will spend about $4 million to clean, repair and upgrade the Malheur National Wildlife Refuge in Burns.

headline.main: Oregon: $4 Million to Clean Area Seized by Ranchers
headline.print_headline: Oregon: $4 Million to Clean Area Seized by Ranchers

snippet: The United States Fish and Wildlife Service will spend about $4 million to clean, repair and upgrade the Malheur National Wildlife Refuge in Burns.
